Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Good to see you up and about! My name's $Actor_20$ and welcome to the Blue Hare Inn. Not too long until people start showing up eh? We're gonna have our hands full keeping any travellers fed.]
[Name:IntroYes][Text:Oh. How interesting. In that case, you should speak with $2$, he and his husband make excellent weapons.]
[Text:You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.][Default][Name:5]
[Name:Collection][Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?]
[Name:Selection][Text:Hello, what can I do for you?][Selection:VillageTalk]

[Name:Task_15_Start][Text:Any chance you could do me a favor? I have some $Item_76$s and some gardening tools that I brought, just in case. Could you plant these for me? Make sure you water them every day, or they won't grow.][ItemID:134/135/76-4]
